description: We have always enjoyed the look of Material Icons, and now We have decided to remake the clock icon as a watch face. The seconds hand swipes across the watch, the angle difference between the seconds and minutes creates a shadow area.And now you can have it on your wrist.Tap the face to cycle between 10 light colors.Easy to read and clean. It shows time, that is all. EnjoyIf you have any problems or suggestions, contact us: pifoxlab@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
We have always enjoyed the look of Material Icons, and now We have decided to remake the clock icon as a watch face.

The seconds hand swipes across the watch, the angle difference between the seconds and minutes creates a shadow area.

And now you can have it on your wrist.
Tap the face to cycle between 10 light colors.

Easy to read and clean. It shows time, that is all.
Enjoy

If you have any problems or suggestions, contact us: pifoxlab@gmail.com
